alert.note: Alert for Reynolds (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 16 at 5:47AM CDT until May 18 at 11:30AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Missouri... Black River near Annapolis. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black River near Annapolis. * WHEN...Until late Thursday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:15 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 10.9 feet. - Bankfull stage is 8.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 12.0 feet this afternoon. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Wed Thu Fri Sat Sun Black River Annapolis 8.0 10.9 7.7 6.1 5.7 5.6 MSG &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
